Create a Query Object

Source: R/query.R
query.Rd

Create a Query Object

Usage

query(...)

query2(...)

Arguments

...

<dynamic-dots> Named conditions

Value

S7 <class_query> object.

Examples

query(
  first_name  = starts_with("And"),
  middle_name = NULL,
  last_name   = contains("J"),
  state       = any_of("CA", "GA", "NY"),
  state_own   = c("GA", "MD"),
  ccn         = "01256",
  rate        = between(0.45, 0.67),
  year        = 2014:2025)
#> <class_query>
#>  @ input :List of 7
#>  .. $ first_name: language starts_with("And")
#>  .. $ last_name : language contains("J")
#>  .. $ state     : language any_of("CA", "GA", "NY")
#>  .. $ state_own : language c("GA", "MD")
#>  .. $ ccn       : chr "01256"
#>  .. $ rate      : language between(0.45, 0.67)
#>  .. $ year      : language 2014:2025
#>  @ params:List of 7
#>  .. $ first_name: <starts_with>
#>  ..  ..@ operator : chr "STARTS_WITH"
#>  ..  ..@ value    : chr "And"
#>  ..  ..@ member_of: chr(0) 
#>  .. $ last_name : <contains>
#>  ..  ..@ operator : chr "CONTAINS"
#>  ..  ..@ value    : chr "J"
#>  ..  ..@ member_of: chr(0) 
#>  .. $ state     : <any_of>
#>  ..  ..@ operator : chr "IN"
#>  ..  ..@ value    : chr [1:3] "CA" "GA" "NY"
#>  ..  ..@ member_of: chr(0) 
#>  .. $ state_own : chr [1:2] "GA" "MD"
#>  .. $ ccn       : chr "01256"
#>  .. $ rate      : <between>
#>  ..  ..@ operator : chr "BETWEEN"
#>  ..  ..@ value    : num [1:2] 0.45 0.67
#>  ..  ..@ member_of: chr(0) 
#>  .. $ year      : int [1:12] 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023 ...
#>  @ groups: list()
query2(
  state = any_of("CA", "GA", "NY"),
  state_owner = c("GA", "MD"),
  or("state", "state_owner"))
#> <class_query>
#>  @ input :List of 3
#>  .. $ state      : language any_of("CA", "GA", "NY")
#>  .. $ state_owner: language c("GA", "MD")
#>  .. $            : language or("state", "state_owner")
#>  @ params:List of 2
#>  .. $ state      : <any_of>
#>  ..  ..@ operator : chr "IN"
#>  ..  ..@ value    : chr [1:3] "CA" "GA" "NY"
#>  ..  ..@ member_of: chr(0) 
#>  .. $ state_owner: chr [1:2] "GA" "MD"
#>  @ groups:List of 1
#>  .. $ g1: <or>
#>  ..  ..@ conjunction: chr "OR"
#>  ..  ..@ members    : chr [1:2] "state" "state_owner"

try(query2(
  first_name  = starts_with("And"),
  ccn         = "01256",
  and("ccn", "npii")))
#> Error in eval(expr, envir) : 
#>   ✖ All group members must be query field names
